actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to make small business procurement policies and procedures as prescribed in such act applicable to the U.S. Postal Service.

summary.text: Makes small business procurement policies and procedures as prescribed in the Small Business Act applicable to the United States Postal Service. (Amends 15 U.S.C. 632).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to make small business procurement policies and procedures as prescribed in such act applicable to the U.S. Postal Service.
